import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function CreateBlog() { const [token, setToken] = useState(""); const headers = { "Content-Type": "application/json", }; const data = { username: "user", password: "YoxWSMLbdYP1", }; useEffect(() => { axios .post("https://wordpress.nsattu.com/wp-json/jwt-auth/v1/token", data, { headers: headers, }) .then((res) => { setToken(res.data.token); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, [token]); const submitHandeler = () => {}; console.log(token); return (
